channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Internet
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Internet

item.title: CVE-2022-30738|2024-08-03T06:56:14.011Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper check in Loader in Samsung Internet prior to 17.0.1.69 allows attackers to spoof address bar via executing script.

item.title: CVE-2022-39873|2024-08-03T12:07:43.117Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 18.0.4.14 allows physical attackers to add bookmarks in secret mode without user authentication.

item.title: CVE-2022-27839|2024-08-03T05:41:10.023Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in SecretMode in Samsung Internet prior to version 16.2.1 allows attackers to access bookmark tab without proper credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-22290|2024-08-03T03:07:50.178Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Incorrect download source UI in Downloads in Samsung Internet prior to 16.0.6.23 allows attackers to perform domain spoofing via a crafted HTML page.

item.title: CVE-2022-22284|2024-08-03T03:07:50.436Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to 16.0.2.19 allows attackers to bypass secret mode password authentication

item.title: CVE-2022-30740|2024-08-03T06:56:14.094Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper auto-fill algorithm in Samsung Internet prior to version 17.0.1.69 allows physical attackers to guess stored credit card numbers.

item.title: CVE-2024-20869|2024-08-01T22:06:36.821Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 25.0.0.41 allows local attackers to bypass protection for cookies.

item.title: CVE-2024-20828|2024-08-01T22:06:36.231Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper authorization verification vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 24.0 allows physical attackers to access files downloaded in SecretMode without proper authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-20837|2024-08-01T22:06:36.497Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper handling of granting permission for Trusted Web Activities in Samsung Internet prior to version 24.0.0.41 allows local attackers to grant permission to their own TWA WebApps without user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2024-20829|2024-08-01T22:06:36.372Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Missing proper interaction for opening deeplink in Samsung Internet prior to version v24.0.0.0 allows remote attackers to open an application without proper interaction.

item.title: CVE-2024-20838|2024-08-01T22:06:36.395Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper validation vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 24.0.3.2 allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20828|2024-07-08T20:13:31.753Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper authorization verification vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 24.0 allows physical attackers to access files downloaded in SecretMode without proper authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-20837|2024-06-04T17:39:52.242Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper handling of granting permission for Trusted Web Activities in Samsung Internet prior to version 24.0.0.41 allows local attackers to grant permission to their own TWA WebApps without user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2024-20829|2024-03-05T04:44:37.660Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Missing proper interaction for opening deeplink in Samsung Internet prior to version v24.0.0.0 allows remote attackers to open an application without proper interaction.

item.title: CVE-2024-20828|2024-02-06T02:23:18.791Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper authorization verification vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 24.0 allows physical attackers to access files downloaded in SecretMode without proper authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-20869|2024-06-04T17:40:35.654Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 25.0.0.41 allows local attackers to bypass protection for cookies.

item.title: CVE-2024-20838|2024-03-05T04:44:47.533Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper validation vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 24.0.3.2 allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20838|2024-07-25T17:04:47.401Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Improper validation vulnerability in Samsung Internet prior to version 24.0.3.2 allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-20829|2024-07-25T17:03:59.915Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20internet
item.description: Missing proper interaction for opening deeplink in Samsung Internet prior to version v24.0.0.0 allows remote attackers to open an application without proper interaction.
